00014 void CDataOut::Draw(IplImage *framecopy)
00015 {
00016        //int rvis=0;
00017   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00018         It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00019     {
00020       if ((*It)->state!=st_empty){
00021         sprintf(strID,"%d",(*It)->ID);
00022         if((*It)->state==3)
00023           {
00024             cvPutText (framecopy,strID,(*It)->pto, &font, cvScalar(0,255,0));
00025           }else if((*It)->state==4)
00026           {
00027             cvPutText (framecopy,strID,(*It)->pto, &font, cvScalar(255,0,0));
00028           }else
00029           {
00030             cvPutText (framecopy,strID,(*It)->pto, &font, cvScalar(0,0,255));
00031           }
00032         cvPutText (framecopy,strID,cvPoint((int)(*It)->projx,(int)(*It)->projy), &font, cvScalar(0,255,255));
00033       }
00034     }

00037 void CDataOut::R_Out()
00038 {
00039   int ii=0;
00040   RFile<<"library(rgl) "<<endl;
00041   RFile<<"rgl.clear(\"all\")"<<endl;
00042   RFile<<"rgl.bg(sphere = TRUE, color = c(\"black\", \"green\"), lit = FALSE, size=2, alpha=0.2, back = \"lines\")"<<endl;
00043   RFile<<"rgl.light()"<<endl;
00044   RFile<<"rgl.bbox()"<<endl;
00045   CvMat *temp2,*temp3;
00046   temp2=cvCreateMat(3,6,CV_32FC1);
00047   temp3=cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
00048             CvMat* m = cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00049   CvMat *temp,*jtemp;
00050   temp=cvCreateMatHeader(6,6,CV_32FC1);
00051   jtemp=cvCreateMat(3,6,CV_32FC1);
00052   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00053         It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00054     {
00055       if((*It)->state>2)
00056         {
00057           float s_th=sin((*It)->theta);
00058           float c_th=cos((*It)->theta);
00059           float s_ph=sin((*It)->phi);
00060           float c_ph=cos((*It)->phi);
00061 
00062           cvmSet(m,0,0,sin((*It)->phi));
00063           cvmSet(m,1,0,-sin((*It)->theta));
00064           cvmSet(m,2,0,cos((*It)->phi));
00065           cvNormalize( m, m);
00066 
00067           float xreal=(*It)->wx +cvmGet(m,0,0)/(*It)->rho;
00068           float yreal=(*It)->wy +cvmGet(m,1,0)/(*It)->rho;
00069           float zreal=(*It)->wz +cvmGet(m,2,0)/(*It)->rho;
00070 
00071 
00072           cvZero(jtemp);
00073           cvmSet(jtemp,0,0,1);
00074           cvmSet(jtemp,1,1,1);
00075           cvmSet(jtemp,2,2,1);
00076 
00077           cvmSet(jtemp,0,3,(-s_th*s_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00078           cvmSet(jtemp,1,3,(-c_th     )/(*It)->rho);
00079           cvmSet(jtemp,2,3,(-s_th*c_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00080 
00081           cvmSet(jtemp,0,4,(c_th*c_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00082           cvmSet(jtemp,1,4,(0    )/(*It)->rho);
00083           cvmSet(jtemp,2,4,(-c_th*s_ph)/(*It)->rho);
00084 
00085           cvmSet(jtemp,0,5,(-c_th*s_ph)/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho));
00086           cvmSet(jtemp,1,5,(s_th     )/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho));
00087           cvmSet(jtemp,2,5,(-c_th*c_ph)/((*It)->rho*(*It)->rho));
00088 
00089           if (12+ii*6< pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post->width && 12+ii*6< pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post->height)
00090             {
00091 
00092               cvGetSubRect( pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post,temp,cvRect(12+ii*6,12+ii*6,6,6) );
00093               cvMatMul(jtemp,temp,temp2);
00094               cvGEMM( temp2,jtemp,1,NULL,0,temp3,CV_GEMM_B_T );
00095 
00096               RFile<<"p"<<ii<< " <- matrix(c(" ;
00097               for (int i=0; i<2 ; i++)
00098                 for (int j=0; j<3;j++)
00099                   {
00100                     RFile<<cvmGet(temp3,i,j)<<",";
00101                   }
00102               RFile<<cvmGet(temp3,2,0)<<",";
00103               RFile<<cvmGet(temp3,2,1)<<",";
00104               RFile<<cvmGet(temp3,2,2);
00105               RFile<<"),3,3)"<<endl;
00106               RFile<<"pos <- c("<<xreal<<", ";
00107               RFile<<yreal<<", ";
00108               RFile<<zreal<<")"<<endl;
00109               RFile<<"try(plot3d( ellipse3d(p"<<ii<<",centre=";
00110               RFile<<"pos), col=\"blue\", alpha=0.5, add = TRUE) )"<<endl;
00111             }
00112         }
00113       ii++;
00114     }
00115   RFile<<"p"<<ii<< " <- matrix(c(" ;
00116   for (int i=0; i<2 ; i++)
00117     for (int j=0; j<3;j++)
00118       {
00119         RFile<<cvmGet(pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post,2*i,2*j)<<",";
00120       }
00121    RFile<<cvmGet(pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post,4,0)<<",";
00122    RFile<<cvmGet(pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post,4,2)<<",";

00140 void CDataOut::Particle(IplImage *framecopy)
00141 {
00142     char ndisp[100];
00143   CvMat* vect2=cvCreateMat(1,6,CV_32FC1);
00144   CvMat* m = cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00145 
00146     sprintf(ndisp,"disp%d.txt",iter++);
00147     DispFile.open(ndisp);
00148     int s;
00149     CvScalar c[pMap->bbdd.size()];
00150     for (int j =0; j<pMap->bbdd.size();j++)
00151     {
00152         c[j]=cvScalar(rand()*255.0/RAND_MAX,rand()*255.0/RAND_MAX,rand()*255.0/RAND_MAX);
00153     }
00154     for (int p=0; p<pParticleFilter->num_particles;p++)
00155     {
00156         int i=0;
00157         s=12;
00158         for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00159             It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00160         {
00161 
00162           if (framecopy != NULL){
00163                 /*  cvCircle (framecopy,cvPoint(pParticleFilter->pred_measure[i][p],
00164                                                 pParticleFilter->pred_measure[i+1][p]),
00165                             1,c[i/2],1 );*/

00167                                                 pParticleFilter->pred_measure[i+1][p]),
00168                             1,cvScalar(0,0,pParticleFilter->weights[p]*10001.0),1 );
00169           }
00170           i+=2;
00171           cvmSet(m,0,0,cos(pParticleFilter->particles[s+3][p])*sin(pParticleFilter->particles[s+4][p]));
00172           cvmSet(m,1,0,-sin(pParticleFilter->particles[s+3][p]));
00173           cvmSet(m,2,0,cos(pParticleFilter->particles[s+3][p])*cos(pParticleFilter->particles[s+4][p]));
00174           cvNormalize( m, m);
00175           cvmSet(vect2,0,0,((pParticleFilter->particles[s][p])+cvmGet(m,0,0)/(pParticleFilter->particles[s+5][p])));
00176           cvmSet(vect2,0,1,((pParticleFilter->particles[s+1][p])+cvmGet(m,1,0)/(pParticleFilter->particles[s+5][p])));
00177           cvmSet(vect2,0,2,((pParticleFilter->particles[s+2][p])+cvmGet(m,2,0)/(pParticleFilter->particles[s+5][p])));
00178           s+=6;
00179           DispFile<<cvmGet(vect2,0,0)<<" ";
00180           DispFile<<cvmGet(vect2,0,1)<<" ";
00181           DispFile<<cvmGet(vect2,0,2)<<" ";
00182           DispFile<< s/6<<endl;
00183 
00184         }
00185           DispFile<<pParticleFilter->particles[0][p]<<" ";
00186           DispFile<<pParticleFilter->particles[2][p]<<" ";
00187           DispFile<<pParticleFilter->particles[4][p]<<" ";
00188           DispFile<<"0";
00189           DispFile<<endl;       
00190     }
00191     cvReleaseMat(&m);
00192     cvReleaseMat(&vect2);
00193     DispFile.close();

00196 void CDataOut::Disp_out(IplImage *framecopy)
00197 {
00198   char ndisp[100];
00199   sprintf(ndisp,"disp%d.txt",iter++);
00200   DispFile.open(ndisp);
00201   int ii=0;
00202   CvMat *temp,*temp2,*temp3;
00203   temp=cvCreateMatHeader(6,6,CV_32FC1);
00204   temp2=cvCreateMat(3,6,CV_32FC1);
00205   temp3=cvCreateMat(3,3,CV_32FC1);
00206   CvMat* vect=cvCreateMat (6,1,CV_32FC1);
00207   CvMat* res6=cvCreateMat (6,1,CV_32FC1);
00208   CvMat* vect2=cvCreateMat(1,6,CV_32FC1);
00209   CvMat* proj = cvCreateMat(4,2,CV_32FC1);    
00210   CvMat* m = cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00211 
00212   for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00213             It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00214     {
00215       if((*It)->state>2)
00216           {
00217 
00218           cvmSet(m,0,0,cos((*It)->theta)*sin((*It)->phi));
00219           cvmSet(m,1,0,-sin((*It)->theta));
00220           cvmSet(m,2,0,cos((*It)->theta)*cos((*It)->phi));
00221           cvNormalize( m, m);
00222 
00223         /*  float xreal=(*It)->wx +cvmGet(m,0,0)/(*It)->rho;
00224           float yreal=(*It)->wy +cvmGet(m,1,0)/(*It)->rho;

00228             {
00229 
00230               cvGetSubRect( pKalman->pKalman->error_cov_post,temp,cvRect(12+ii*6,12+ii*6,6,6) );
00231 
00232         for (int part=0; part<40; part++){
00233                   cvmSet(vect,0,0,randomVector(-.005,.005));
00234                   cvmSet(vect,1,0,randomVector(-.005,.005));
00235                   cvmSet(vect,2,0,randomVector(-.005,.005));
00236                   cvmSet(vect,3,0,randomVector(-.005,0.005));
00237                   cvmSet(vect,4,0,randomVector(-.005,0.005));
00238                   cvmSet(vect,5,0,randomVector(-1,1));
00239 
00240           cvMatMul(temp,vect,res6);
00241 
00242           cvmSet(m,0,0,cos(cvmGet(res6,3,0)+(*It)->theta)*sin(cvmGet(res6,4,0)+(*It)->phi));
00243                   cvmSet(m,1,0,-sin(cvmGet(res6,3,0)+(*It)->theta));
00244                   cvmSet(m,2,0,cos(cvmGet(res6,3,0)+(*It)->theta)*cos(cvmGet(res6,4,0)+(*It)->phi));
00245           cvNormalize( m, m);
00246           cvmSet (vect2,0,0,((cvmGet(res6,0,0)+(*It)->wx)+cvmGet(m,0,0)/(cvmGet(res6,5,0)+(*It)->rho)));
00247           cvmSet(vect2,0,1,((cvmGet(res6,1,0)+(*It)->wy)+cvmGet(m,1,0)/(cvmGet(res6,5,0)+(*It)->rho)));
00248           cvmSet(vect2,0,2,((cvmGet(res6,2,0)+(*It)->wz)+cvmGet(m,2,0)/(cvmGet(res6,5,0)+(*It)->rho)));
00249 
00250         DispFile<<cvmGet(vect2,0,0)<<" ";
00251         DispFile<<cvmGet(vect2,0,1)<<" ";
00252         DispFile<<cvmGet(vect2,0,2)<<" ";
00253         DispFile<<ii<<endl;
00254           cvmSet(vect2,0,0,cvmGet(res6,0,0)+(*It)->wx);
00255           cvmSet(vect2,0,1,cvmGet(res6,1,0)+(*It)->wy);
00256           cvmSet(vect2,0,2,cvmGet(res6,2,0)+(*It)->wz);
00257           cvmSet(vect2,0,3,cvmGet(res6,3,0)+(*It)->theta);
00258           cvmSet(vect2,0,4,cvmGet(res6,4,0)+(*It)->phi);
00259           cvmSet(vect2,0,5,cvmGet(res6,5,0)+(*It)->rho);
00260 
00261              pModelCam->cvProject_1_pto(vect2,proj,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00262              if (framecopy != NULL){
00263                    cvCircle (framecopy,cvPoint(cvmGet(proj,0,0),cvmGet(proj,0,1)),1,cvScalar(0,0,255),1 );
00264              }
00265               }
00266 
00267             }
00268           }
00269       ii++;
00270     }
00271     cvReleaseMatHeader(&temp);

00273     cvReleaseMat(&temp3);
00274     cvReleaseMat(&vect);

00289 void CDataOut::Feat()
00290 {
00291 
00292   CvMat *m;
00293   m=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00294 
00295   for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();It != pMap->bbdd.end();It++)
00296     {
00298       cvmSet(m,0,0,cos((*It)->theta)*sin((*It)->phi));
00299       cvmSet(m,1,0,-sin((*It)->theta));
00300       cvmSet(m,2,0,cos((*It)->theta)*cos((*It)->phi));
00301       cvNormalize( m, m);
00302       FeatFile<<(*It)->wx +cvmGet(m,0,0)/(*It)->rho<<" ";
00303       FeatFile<<(*It)->wy +cvmGet(m,1,0)/(*It)->rho<<" ";
00304       FeatFile<<(*It)->wz +cvmGet(m,2,0)/(*It)->rho<<" ";
00305       FeatFile<<(*It)->ID<<" ";
00306       FeatFile<<(*It)->count;
00307       FeatFile<<endl;
00308     }
00309   cvReleaseMat(&m);
00310 
00311 }

00350 float CDataOut::randomVector(float max,float min)
00351 {
00352      float x = min;
00353      float y = max-min;
00354 return  x+ (y*rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0));
00355 
00356 }
